page.title: 04FELTHAM CARNIVAL
page.content: Every year the Feltham Carnival is held with such events as; the picking of the Carnival Queen,who plays a very important part in the carnivals exciting events. This yeras Queen is Karen Ancell,her senior princesses are Tina Boyd and Sharon Dunsby.These people attend functions concerning the carnival which are always for charity; the Baby Show. This is very popular with everyone as hopeful mothers take their babies to be judged. At the end of the afternoon three babies are presented with a prize; fates and stalls. These are the main attractions of the carnival. Amongst all the things that are sold are the crafts made by the elderly and all the proceeds go to charity.
